thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Diane Ladas
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Diane Ladas

author: Diane Ladas
title: Diane Ladas
text: When you decide to use services as these, people tend to feel embarrassed and/or belittled. The professionals from this group, are wonderful people, with always a smile on their faces, and never making clients feel embarrassed. Jackie is such a kind and thoughtful person to have worked with, she tended to our needs and always made us feel comfortable. She always stays in touch and is always available for any further questions. Thank you for having her part of your team.
